statement.p: In 43.24 of the last 37 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{37}}={0.4324}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{37}. \displaystyle{P}={0.4324}\cdot{37}={15.9988}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 37-15.9988=21.0012 We round that as requested to 21.
